channel.title: Error When i Attack on 317
channel.description:
This is what happens when i attack on my server this shows up on the client batch window
[code] RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1351) at client.method146(client.java:12044) at client.method102(client.java:7907) at client.method9(client.java:8780) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4589) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
